title: Writing Tools
author: Librarian Sora
pages: To write your own stories, you'll need the right tools.
Begin by gathering ink, derived from the humble squid roaming the waters.
Feathers are essential for quills, easily collected from wandering chickens.
A writing setup requires parchment; paper crafted from sugarcane fits perfectly.
Don't forget leather, crucial for sturdy book covers, gathered from cattle.
With these items in hand, you'll be ready to craft tales of your own.
